game.name: Shoni Island
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Settle, build, and survive on the enigmatic Shoni Island. Manage quirky NPCs, farm, and appease four unpredictable gods. Solve tricky puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, and balance chill with challenge in this captivating cozy survival adventure. Will you escape or become part of the island’s legend?
